events.message: Customer submitted a claim reporting a car collision that occurred at an intersection yesterday afternoon.
The claim was categorized under 'Auto Accident' due to the reported vehicle collision and damages involved.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle the investigation and communication for this accident.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps clearly.
Request made for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and witness statements to support the claim.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including the police report, vehicle photos, and insurance policy copy.
Investigator began reviewing all submitted materials and contacted witnesses to verify the details of the accident.
Investigation confirmed that the customer was not at fault and documented extent of damages to the vehicle.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to cover repairs and rental car reimbursement during the repair period.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling and fairness of the proposed settlement offer.
Approval was granted by the underwriting team to proceed with the settlement payment for the auto damage claim.
Payment was successfully issued to the customer for the full approved settlement amount without delays.
The claim was officially closed following confirmation that the payment had been received and repairs completed.
All claim files and documentation were archived securely for future reference and audit purposes.
